description: a. Who is most at risk
title: a. Who is most at risk
content:
Everyone is at risk and must therefore take measures to prevent themselves
from catching the disease. However, during an outbreak, those at higher risk
of infection are: health workers and family members or others in close contact
with infected people.

_Exposure to the virus can be controlled through the use of protective
measures in clinics and hospitals, at community gatherings, or at home._
